meanings.definition: To teach or provide knowledge or information to someone
meanings.sent1: The teacher will instruct the students on how to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: She will instruct the new employees on the company's policies.
meanings.sent3: The robot was programmed to instruct the curious puppy on basic commands.
meanings.sent4: The wise owl instructs the young owlets on the ways of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The experienced chef will instruct you on the art of baking the perfect cake.
